fields.title: Close Combat Phobia
fields.text: The Lord of the Citadel induces a phobia against close combat among the Doomtroopers. Doomtroopers may not attack in close combat during the rest of the round.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Dark Teleportation
fields.text: Immediately move one Dark Legion figure on any sector tile to an empty square on any other sector tile. This counts as one of that figure's actions for the turn.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Temporary Defensive System
fields.text:
A defense system of the Citadel is triggered. The Dark Legion player targetts 1 Doomtrooper figure in any sector and attacks them with ⬛⬛⬛.
Doomtrooper defense and armor checks apply.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Close Combat Frenzy
fields.text: Close combat frenzy grips the Dark Legion troops. When making a close combat attack, all Dark Legion creatures may re-roll one combat die of the Dark Legion player's choice. This lasts for the duration of the Dark Legion turn.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Mental Block
fields.text: The Lord of the Citadel induces a mental block in all Doomtroopers that disrupts their senses. No Doomtroopers may make firearms attacks for the remainder of this round.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Necrofrenzy
fields.text: A wave of necro-energy pulsates through the Citadel. All Necromutants and Centurions are allowed one extra action during the Dark Legion player's turn.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Dark Energy Wave
fields.text: A wave of Dark Symmetry sweeps through the Citadel. All Dark Legion creatures may re-roll one combat die of the Dark Legion player's choice when making a firearm attack. This lasts for the duration of the Dark Legion player's turn.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Intercepted Orders
fields.text: The Dark Legion disrupt communications between a Doomtrooper target and their combat coordinators. The targeted Doomtrooper is reduced to 1 action on their next turn. Doomtrooper cards can still be used for extra actions. Place this card face up next to the affected Doomtrooper, then discard once their turn is complete.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Dark Influence
fields.text: The Dark Legion and Dark Symmetry briefly synchronise. The Dark Legion player may take up to 2 extra actions during their turn. Extra actions can be assigned to any of their creatures, even after that creature has completed its activation for the turn.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Magnetic Restraints
fields.text: The Doomtroopers have triggered the sector's magnetic floor restraints. The Dark Legion player chooses which sector tile. All Doomtroopers on that sector tile are considered blocked until the end of the round. A blocked character can only move two squares during a Move action.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Combat Neurosis
fields.text: A Doomtrooper team is gripped by combat neurosis. The targeted Doomtrooper team cannot use Doomtrooper cards on their next turn. Play this card face up next to the affected Corporation player, then discard once their turn is complete.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Corrupted Equipment
fields.text: A wave of Corruption surges through the Citadel, warping the Doomtroopers' tactical gear. The Dark Legion player targets 1 Doomtrooper. If possible, the targeted Doomtrooper must discard one non-weapon equipment card.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Security Encryption
fields.text: The Citadel's defenses receive new security protocols. Doomtroopers may not make tech attacks for the rest of this round.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Defensive Spike
fields.text:
The Dark Symmetry crackles through the Citadel's arteries. Each Doomtrooper with a tech weapon or tech weapon combo adjacent to a wall is attacked by a trap (see Dark Legion reference board).
Doomtrooper defense and armor checks apply.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Legion Charge
fields.text: The forces of the Dark Legion make a massed charge.
fields.reinforcements:
1 Centurion
1 Necromutant
2 Legionnaires per Corporation player

fields.title: Fallen Friend
fields.text: A Doomtrooper team is struck with horror. Choose a Corporation player. Their Doomtroopers cannot make close combat attacks against Centurions during their next attack. Place this card face up next to the affected Corporation player, then discard once their turn is over.
fields.reinforcements:
1 Centurion
Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Razide Fear
fields.text: A Doomtrooper team is crippled with fear. Choose a Corporation player. Their Doomtroopers cannot make close combat attacks against Razides during their next attack. Place this card face up next to the affected Corporation player, then discard once their turn is over.
fields.reinforcements:
1 Razide
Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: An Eerie Silence
fields.text: No Event.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: A Moment Of Respite
fields.text: No Event.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Twin Terror
fields.text: Two Praetorian Stalkers enter the Citadel. Fear and destruction follow Algeroth's fearsome machines of war.
fields.reinforcements: 2 Praetorian Stalkers

fields.title: Nepharite Time Rift
fields.text: A Nepharite warps time and reality, moving through it while everything around them stands still. A Nepharite figure may move through other figures and walls on its Move actions during the Dark Legion player's turn.
fields.reinforcements:
1 Nepharite
1 Necromutant
1 Legionnaire

fields.title: Ezoghoul Attack
fields.text: A huge Ezoghoul enters the Citadel. The Ezoghoul can enter through any Doomtrooper or Dark Legion entrance token.
fields.reinforcements:
1 Ezoghoul
3 Legionnaires

fields.title: Legionnaire Frenzy
fields.text: The Citadel radiates an electrified vibration which energizes the Dark Legion footsoldiers. All Legionnaires may perform 1 extra action during the Dark Legion players turn.
fields.reinforcements:
1 Legionnaire
Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Razide Fury
fields.text: The Razides in the Citadel are glowing with rage. All Razides add one extra ⬜ to all attack actions this round.
fields.reinforcements:
1 Razide
Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Mitosis
fields.text: Before placing reinforcements, a Dark Legion creature of the Dark Legion player's choice spawns a clone in an adjacent square. A Nepharite or Ezoghoul cannot be chosen.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Berserk
fields.text: The Dark Legion are overcome with bloodlust. Choose 1 Centurion or Necromutant. Doomtroopers may not perform armor checks against this creature for the remainder of this round.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Unholy Transformation
fields.text: The Necromutants sup on the dark energy of the Citadel. Before placing reinforcements, promote up to 2 Necromutants to Centurions. Unless the figures are unavailable, replace the selected Necromutants with Centurions.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Surrounded
fields.text: Dark Legion forces are attacking from all sides. For this round, providing a Doomtrooper is present on the sector tile and the entrance does not join another sector tile, Dark Legion reinforcements may enter through any entrance of the sector tile.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Defensive Upload
fields.text: The Citadel's defenses are upgraded. For the duration of this round, the Dark Legion player may force a Tech Specialist to re-roll 1 combat die used in any attack. The Dark Legion player chooses which die.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players

fields.title: Flickering Light
fields.text: Something moves in the shadows, but it is not yet ready to show itself. No Event.
fields.reinforcements: Draw as many force cards as there are Corporation players
